description.name: AG Tele Eclipse Commons Update Site

site.description: This is the update site for the various plug-ins that offer methods and tools for working more efficiently with the Eclipse Modeling Framework.

category-def.name: de.tud.et.ifa.agtele.eclipse.commons.category
category-def.label: AG Tele Eclipse Commons
category-def.description: This site contains the AGTele Eclipse Commons Tools that offers convience methods and tools for working with the Eclipse Modeling Framework.
